elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Complete the sentences in the following exercise.

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: A person who can competently assess a certain situation is therefore not yet capable of acting in the legal sense, unless he or she is ... .
elements.correctAnswer: A person who can competently assess a certain situation is therefore not yet legally capable of acting, unless they are of legal age.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: If it is not, it is considered ... ... .
elements.correctAnswer: If it does not, it is deemed to have limited capacity to act.

elements.name: Frage 3
elements.title: If, on the other hand, a person is of legal age but only ... ... , they have limited legal capacity.
elements.correctAnswer: If, on the other hand, a person is of legal age but only has limited capacity, they have limited legal capacity.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: If a person is not ..., it does not matter whether they are of legal age or not.
elements.correctAnswer: If a person lacks capacity, it does not matter whether they are of legal age or not.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: In the legal sense, it is considered ... .
elements.correctAnswer: It is considered legally incapable of acting.
